document.full_text: the trainer jerry hollendorfer and the champion fillies open mind, safely kept and sky beauty were elected to the national museum of racing's hall of fame in saratoga spring, n.y.
document.title: sports briefing | horse racing: trainer and three fillies elected to hall of fame
